product_name: Gerber Myth Folding Sheath Drop Point Knife
long_description: The quiet, lightweight Gerber Myth Folding Sheath Drop Point Knife is built with an aggressive handle design and high carbon stainless-steel blade-perfect for your active outdoor adventures. Soft, comfortable rubberized handle offers a secure grip no matter the conditions. Hard plastic sheath includes a built-in carbide sharpener.
short_description: The quiet, lightweight Gerber Myth Folding Sheath Drop Point Knife is built with an aggressive handle design and high carbon stainless-steel blade-perfect for your active outdoor adventures.
